message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for the price of $13,000. I think you'll find this to be a very fair offer considering its value.
I'm really interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $11,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to consider that price?
